alert.note: Alert for Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:44AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following bayou in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Webster, Bossier, and Bienville Parishes. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana...Arkansas... Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill affecting Webster Parish and Columbia County. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill and Dixie Inn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill, Louisiana. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding of private boat ramps. Move livestock to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum bayou stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Saturday was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The upper Bayou Dorcheat is expected to fall to 12.1 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
